Text:
Thank you for this upload, my DVD's are getting a bit worn around the edges so to speak. I've Just stared downloading your season 1 torrent, then will DL this one once I've finished seeding season 1 back. I for one hope you have the time and inclination (sp?) to upload all 7 seasons.

Thanks again for sharing.
pls seed there are no seeders :''(

ginaverduijn, I don't know what you are talking about, i just completed downloading this and there were always seeds, counting me there are currently 9 seeds on this. Even when i wasn't actively connected to a seed i still got decent download speed because of the distribution across the peers.
 I averaged 71 KB/s, which on my dsl is pretty good for any torrent.
As long as i have this comment window open, I'll say thanks again for this and the other BtVS uploads, I'm half way thru watching the season 1 rip from this uploader and they all look amazing so far.

greetings, I've just begun to watch
Buffy.The.Vampire.Slayer.S02E10.AC3.DVDRip.x264-iND which should be Episode 10: What's My Line?: Part 2, but it appears to be a duplicated encode of
Episode 9: What's My Line?: Part 1. If the uploader could double check this and maybe then add a proper copy to a future season upload. (just a thought)
other than that, season 1 and the prior season 2 vids have all been great.
SEEEED PLEAASE ITS TAKING FOREVER
Thanks again. These are the best buffy-torrent i've seen so far. pleeeeaaaase upload the other seasons too.

How do you open these files? Everytime I try, it says that it can not be opened. It won't unzip or play. Help please? I'm kind of new at this. Besides that, and once I can actually view them, I think this is an amazing upload! Please upload the rest!

@mtee: try the VLC-player. it play's everything.
